alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Suffolk; Surry; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 3:03PM EDT until October 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to one foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. For the Coastal Flood Watch, one to three feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Surry, James City, Isle of Wight, and York Counties...in addition to the Cities of Newport News and Suffolk. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 8 PM EDT this evening. For the Coastal Flood Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. JAMES RIVER AT SCOTLAND/JAMESTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 4.5 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/05 PM 4.3 2.1 1.8 1 MINOR 02/04 AM 3.3 1.1 1.5 1 NONE 02/05 PM 3.8 1.6 1.4 1 NONE 03/07 AM 4.1 1.9 2.3 1 MINOR 03/07 PM 5.1 2.9 2.7 1 MAJOR 04/07 AM 4.7 2.5 2.8 1 MODERATE SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/02 PM 4.5 1.7 1.4 1 MINOR 02/02 AM 3.7 0.9 1.3 1 NONE 02/03 PM 4.3 1.5 1.3 1-2 NONE 03/05 AM 5.4 2.6 3.4 3-4 MINOR 03/04 PM 6.4 3.6 3.5 5 MODERATE 04/04 AM 5.4 2.6 3.1 4 MINOR YORKTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 5.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.9 FT, MODERATE 2.4 FT, MAJOR 2.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/02 PM 4.4 1.8 1.4 1 NONE 02/02 AM 3.7 1.1 1.4 1 NONE 02/03 PM 4.2 1.6 1.2 1 NONE 03/03 AM 4.9 2.3 2.6 1-3 MINOR 03/04 PM 5.6 3.0 2.7 3 MAJOR 04/04 AM 4.8 2.2 2.5 2 MINOR FORT MONROE VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/02 AM 3.6 0.8 1.2 1 NONE 02/03 PM 4.6 1.8 1.6 1-2 MINOR 03/03 AM 5.2 2.4 2.8 3-4 MINOR 03/03 PM 6.1 3.3 3.3 4-5 MAJOR 04/04 AM 5.3 2.5 2.9 4 MINOR &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
